description: StoryFlow closed-loop board sync — dispatches the storyflow-agent to keep the board in sync with actual work

hooks.prompt: Plan approved. Use the storyflow-agent to create issues from the plan and set them to In Progress. Pass it the plan details.
Todos updated. Use the storyflow-agent to sync the todo list to the StoryFlow board. Pass it the current todos with their statuses.

hooks.command: input=$(cat); cmd=$(echo "$input" | grep -o '"command":"[^"]*"' | head -1 | sed 's/"command":"//;s/"$//'); if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then echo '{"systemMessage": "Commit detected. Use the storyflow-agent to update the StoryFlow board — pass it the commit message so it can mark completed issues Done."}'; fi

hooks.prompt: Session ending. Use the storyflow-agent to reconcile the StoryFlow board before stopping. If StoryFlow is not configured or unreachable, skip silently and approve the stop.
